nodes.text: In 14 BBY, a skirmish ensued between the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader and a scout party of Mustafarians, who had been sent by their clan leader, Father Kkkt, to investigate the arrival of the Sith Lord. Vader was able to kill two of the Mustafarians and one of their lava fleas. He then used the Mask of Lord Momin to possess the Northern Mustafarian Sssp. As he did this, the Southern Mustafarian Rrrn fled the scene, later telling Kkkt of what he saw.
